notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: Maryam Navi, Alana Hansen, Monika Nitschke, and Dino Pisaniello conceived and designed the study. Alana Hansen, Monika Nitschke, and Dino Pisaniello made substantial contributions to recruitment. Maryam Navi conducted and transcribed interviews, analyzed the data, and wrote the manuscript. Alana Hansen, Monika Nitschke, and Scott Hanson-Easey assisted in the analysis and interpretation of data, and in the revision of the manuscript. All authors read and approved the final manuscript.
